In this way she and her family will be able to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn at wholesale and lime.

loans.name: Evelin Del Carmen

texts.es: Evelin de 37 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus tres hijos, ella se dedica desde hace 8 años al cultivo de maiz, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, Evelin esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. y poder mejorar el terreno para hacer su siembra que es el que muestra la fotografía y asi poder continuar con sus siembras ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo.
texts.en: Evelin is 37 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and three children. She has been growing corn for 8 years and sells her product in different markets near her home. Evelin is seeking a loan to buy fertilizer, manure, insecticide, pesticide, etc. so she can improve her land to plant her crops. Her land is pictured in the photograph. In this way she will be able to continue farming, which is her only source of work.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, manure, insecticide, herbicide, etc. to improve her land.

loans.name: Juan Francisco

texts.es: Juan de 49 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, el se dedica desde hace varios años a la crianza de pollos, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados y ya tiene clientes fijos que lo prefieren por los buenos precios, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de concentrado y mas pollos para continuar con la crianza ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo e ingresos.
texts.en: Juan is 49 years old and lives in his own house with his family. For the past several years he has worked raising chickens which he sells in various markets. He has regular clients who prefer him due to his good prices. He is requesting a loan to buy concentrated feed and more chickens to continue raising chickens. It is his only source of work and income.

loans.use: to buy concentrated feed and more chickens.

loans.name: Asmaa

texts.en: Asmaa is a 21-year-old married lady living with her husband in Mafraq-Jordan. Her husband serves in the military. She is a university student majoring in Accounting. Asmaa is seeking a job in her field that will let her help her husband in improving their living conditions. But because she doesn't have enough money to pay for her upcoming semester fees, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to pay fees for her upcoming semester

loans.name: Fidelina Del Carmen

texts.es:
Fidelina tiene 30 años de edad, estudió hasta 9º grado de educación básica, actualmente está acompañada y tiene tres hijos los cuales dos de ellos están yendo a la escuela y el otro aún no, su compañero de vida es albañil desde hace 15 años.

Fidelina se dedica a la venta de tortillas desde hace 6 años, esta idea surgió cuando notó que la gente de su comunidad tenía que caminar mucho para comprar tortillas, anteriormente se dedicaba a la venta de pescado.

Ella necesita este crédito para comprar láminas porque necesita cambiar el techo de su casa, ya que es época de lluvia y el agua ingresa al hogar.

Su sueño es tener una vivienda digna y sacar adelante a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Fidelina is 30 years old and completed a 9th grade education. Today she is married and has three children, two of whom are in school and the third is not yet in school. Her husband has worked as a bricklayer for 15 years.

Fidelia has been selling tortillas for 6 years. She got this idea when she noted that the people in her community had to walk a ways to buy tortillas. Previously she sold fish.

She needs this loan to buy sheet metal as she needs to change the roof of her home. It is the rainy season and water is entering the home. Her dream is to have a dignified life and help her children be successful.

loans.use: to buy sheet metal for her roof.

loans.name: Nyomo Baafee Group

texts.en:
This group is made up of two members getting stronger all the time, and they are on their seventh loan. They remain determined to continue working with the group, because they say that by joining together and helping one another, they can get much further ahead. They deal with groceries and foodstuff.

Comfort, a member of this group, is worth highlighting for her drive and effort in improving her standard of living. She works by selling foodstuff at home.  With the loan she is requesting, she will buy more yams, and rice to sell. She is 52 years old and lives alone.

In the same way, her fellow group member is highly motivated, and works energetically, with an enterprising spirit. They will hold each other responsible for the repayment of the loan.

loans.use: to buy more yams, and rice to sell.

loans.name: Jose Carmen

texts.es: José de 47 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su grupo familiar y sus 2 hijos de 26 y 24 años de edad. Él es un hombre que toda la vida se ha esforzado por sacar adelante a sus hijos, apoyado en su trabajo de albañil el cual realiza desde hace más de 10 años. En la parte trasera de la vivienda de José se encuentra un muro de tierra el cual con cada lluvia corre el riesgo de desbordarse y para proteger su vivienda y su familia desea construir un muro de contención en esa área de su vivienda y es por ello que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, arena, grava, ladrillo y hierro para construir un  muro de contención en su vivienda.
texts.en:
José is 47 years old and lives in his own home with his family and his two children who are 26 and 24. He is a man who has always tried to raise his children well and provide for them, which he does through his construction job that he has had for over 10 years. 

In the back of his home, there is an earthen wall that risks overflowing every time it rains. To protect his home and his family, he wants to build a retaining wall in that area. This is why he is requesting a loan through FUSAI: to buy cement, sand, gravel, brick, and iron, to build a retaining wall in his home.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, gravel, brick, and iron, to build a retaining wall in his home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothing at wholesale.

loans.name: Adjovi

texts.fr: Veuve de 53ans, Adjovi est mère de famille. Elle revend des denrées alimentaires depuis 1990 à Lomé. Son premier crédit qu'elle sollicite à WAGES l'aidera à acheter plus de marchandises afin de satisfaire les besoins des clients. Elle espère à l'avenir vendre en gros des œufs, avoir une boutique et bien nourrir sa famille.
texts.en: Adjovi, a 54-year-old widow, is a mother of a family. She has been selling grocery items in Lomé since 1990. The first loan she is requesting from WAGES will help her to purchase more merchandise to meet customer needs. For the future, she hopes to be a wholesaler of eggs, to have a store, and to feed her family well.

loans.use: to purchase grocery items

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 28 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto de riesgo, se dedica  a la venta de frutas de forma ambulante por los diferentes mercados y colonias, tiene mucha clientela ya que es un producto muy vendible, la joven vive en casa propia con su hijo y su compañero de vida, ella esta solicitando un crédito para poder comprar mas fruta (melón, jocotes, sandia, piña, mango, etc.) todo por mayor y poder tener mejores ganancias.
texts.en: The young woman in the picture's face has been pixellated, because she is 28 years old and lives in a high risk area. She makes a living as a traveling fruit vendor in different markets and areas. She has a lot of customers, as her product is very easy to sell. She lives in her own home with her son and husband. She is requesting a loan to buy more fruit (melons, plums, watermelon, pineapple, mangos, etc.) at wholesale so that she can earn higher profits.

loans.use: to buy more fruit (melons, plums, watermelon, pineapple, mangos, etc.) at wholesale to sell.

loans.name: Angelina

texts.en:
Angelina is 61 years old and married with nine children. She lives in the Philippines.

Angelina is involved in the agricultural business and specifically works in pig fattening. Angelina requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Angelina has been in pig fattening for 2 years now, and has borrowed 4 times in the past from NWTF to sustain the business.

Angelina would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Fernando Andres

texts.es:
Fernando, a sus 20 años de edad, es un hombre carismático, activo y servicial. 

Ser independiente, fue el principal motivo para luchar incansablemente día a día, buscando alternativas para ganarse la vida y llevar el sustento a su hogar.

 Desde hace aproximadamente 5 años, comenzó a fabricar y comercializar calzado para todo tipo de clientes, de muy buena calidad y a excelentes precios, lo que le permitió darse a conocer en el sector y lograr la trayectoria que tiene. 

Esto lo impulsa a solicitar el apoyo del crédito para fortalecer sus inventarios, pues comprará insumos como cuero, suelas y pegas para capitalizar su negocio y así podrá satisfacer la demanda que aumenta en la temporada escolar, pues cuenta con la ventaja de vivir en un barrio donde hay mucha afluencia de estudiantes; esto le ayudará a mejorar los ingresos que percibe por su labor. 

Fernando manifiesta que su poca experiencia no le impide seguir haciendo lo que le apasiona, por ello siempre se propone nuevas metas y entre ellas está el de convertirse en una gran distribuidora de calzado y generar oportunidades de empleo, así podrá mejorar la calidad de vida y el bienestar tanto de su familia, como la de aquellas personas que le ayuden a realizar su labor diaria.
texts.en:
Fernando is a charismatic, active, and hardworking 20-year-old man. 

His desire to be self-sufficient has kept him pushing tirelessly every day, looking for ways to earn a living and support his family.

About five years ago he began to make and sell high-quality, affordable shoes for all sorts of customers, which has made him well known in the industry and helped him achieve the success that he has.

He is therefore requesting a loan to build up his stock. He will buy products such as leather, soles, and glues to use in his business so he can satisfy demand, which goes up during the school year because his business is strategically located in an area where there are a lot of students. This will help him increase the income he earns from his labor.

Fernando says that though he is relatively inexperienced, he has been able to keep doing what he loves. He always sets himself new goals to pursue; his current goal is to become a major shoe distributor and generate employment opportunities so he can improve the quality of life and well-being of not just his family but also the people who help him carry out his work.

loans.use: to buy products such as leather, soles, and glues to use in his business so he can satisfy demand, which goes up during the school year.

loans.name: Dulce

texts.en:
Dulce is a married woman with seven children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Dulce is 47 years old and has two children who are currently in school.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines. Dulce has requested a PHP 22,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients like fish, meat, vegetables, etc. for her food production business. Dulce has been in this business for five years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like fish, meat, vegetables, etc. for her food production business.

loans.name: Kashutu

texts.en:
Kashutu is married and has been blessed with two children, aged 3 years and 8 months. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. 

For the past four years, Kashutu has operated a retail shop business, selling household consumables to local customers. She faces a major challenge of high transportation costs in her place of operation. 

Kashutu plans to use this KES 40,000 loan to purchase bundles of wheat flour, beans and maize flour, and soft drinks. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of wheat flour, beans and maize flour, and soft drinks

loans.name: Jesus Antonio

texts.es:
El  señor Jesus desde muy joven se dedico a las funciones del campo tales como agricultura y ganadería, actividades que le enseño su padre para que saliera adelante en su vida.

Hoy en día su actividad principal es la agricultura y la ganadería y tiene como objetivo mejorar su capital comprando algunos lotes de ganado que le permitan abastecerse y generar mejores ingresos, y esta es la razón por la cual solicita un préstamo.

Es padre responsable y amoroso con sus hijos, vive en una finca con ellos y su esposa quien ha sido su más grande compañía.

Sueña con poder otorgarles a sus hijos una educación de calidad para que más adelante se puedan defender solos y sean independientes.

Todos los días asiste su negocio y procura por hacer las cosas muy bien.
texts.en:
From a young age Jesus has worked farming by growing crops or raising cattle, work his father taught him so he could support himself. Today his primary work is agriculture and cattle, and he has a goal of improving his capital to buy some cattle that will allow him to continue to support himself and generate greater income, so he is seeking a loan.

He is a responsible father and loving to his children. He lives on a farm with his children and his wife, who has been his greatest companion. He dreams of being able to provide a quality education to his children so that they may be successful and independent. Every day he tends to his business and ensures that things are going well.

loans.use: to buy several head of cattle.

loans.name: Lali

texts.en:
Lali is 39 years old. She lives with her 3 children in the Zugdidi district.

Lali works as a sales lady at a used clothes shop and earns 200 GEL monthly, which is not enough for her four-member family. Lali decided to start an additional business and requested a loan.

The Start Up program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva and Credo, enables her to get a loan of $300 to purchase clothes and begin trading the clothes. Lali will get orders and will purchase clothes at wholesale prices and she will then resell them at higher prices.

With this loan, she will have additional income and will be able to provide her children with better living conditions. Lali awaits your support.

loans.use: to begin trading clothes to earn additional income

loans.name: José Emilio

texts.es:
José tiene 58 años de edad, estudió hasta quinto grado, está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tiene 5 hijos pero solo 2 viven en el mismo terreno de José pero tienen sus propias casas.

José trabaja en la agricultura desde que era muy pequeño, ya que su padre le inculcó este trabajo, actualmente siembra  3 hectáreas de maíz y una de ajonjolí, esto lo hace lo hace en época de invierno, todos los días madruga a las 3 de la mañana y uno de sus hijos se involucra.

Los fondos del crédito serán destinados para comprar insumos agrícolas como abonos, fertilizantes y otros insumos necesarios para el cultivo de 3 hectáreas de maíz.

Él sueña con seguir trabajando para mantenerse por su propia cuenta y mantener a su mujer.
texts.en:
José is 58 years old and studied up to Grade 5. He is in a relationship and his wife does domestic work. He has five children. Two of them live on the same plot of land but have their own houses. José has worked in agriculture since he was quite young. His father taught him this trade.

Today he cultivates 3 hectares of corn and one hectare of sesame. He does this in the winter, starting every day at 3 am. One of his children is involved in this work. The money from the loan will be used to buy agricultural inputs like manure, fertilizer and other inputs needed to grow 3 hectares of corn. His dream is to continue to work to support himself and support his wife.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs like manure, fertilizer, and other inputs for his corn crops.

loans.name: Nino

texts.en:
Nino is a 39-year-old married woman. She lives in Lagodekhi district, Kakheti region with her husband, two children and retired father. Nino works at local library and gets small monthly salary.  She is also involved in agricultural activities. In particular, she owns a plot of land, where she grows eggplants, maize, cabbages and peppers. Nino sells the harvested products locally. 

As the existing income from agricultural activities is seasonal, Nino decided to start an additional trading business. The start-up program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva and Credo, enables her to get a loan of 4,000 Gel. She will purchase the stock of used clothes and will resell at higher prices to the door-to-door community in order to get additional income. With the increased income she will provide better living conditions for her family.

loans.use: to purchase a stock of used clothes to sell.

loans.name: Juan Francisco

texts.es:
Juan de 64 años de edad,  desde pequeño se dedicó a trabajar ya que sus padres eran de escasos recursos económicos y no pudieron mandarlo a estudiar, su esposa se dedica a trabajar como comerciante de pescado fresco que se obtiene de la laguna cercana a su vivienda, sus hijos ya son mayores de edad y tienen su propia familia.

Juan cultiva maíz y frijol, actualmente está cultivando una hectárea de maíz, madruga a trabajar y el lugar está a un kilómetro de distancia, también su padre le enseñó la pesca artesanal ya que en esa zona la mayoría de familias se dedican a esta actividad.

Los fondos del crédito serán utilizados para comprar redes y una lancha que será utilizada para la pesca.
Su sueño es seguir trabajando y mantener a su compañera de vida y además le gustaría mejorar su vivienda.
texts.en:
Juan is 64 years old. He has worked since he was a young child as his parents were very poor and couldn't afford to send him to school. His wife works selling fresh fish she gets from a lake near their home. Their children are now grown and have their own families.

Juan grows corn and beans, and today farms a hectare of corn. He gets up early in the morning to work in his field which is one kilometer from his home. His father also taught him how to fish using traditional practices, and the majority of families in this area are fishermen.

The loan will be used to buy nets and a boat to use while fishing. His dream is to continue working and supporting his wife. He would also like to improve his home.

loans.use: to buy nets and a boat to fish.

loans.name: Alicia Del Carmen

texts.es: Doña Alicia de 62 años de edad se dedica desde hace varios años a la venta de tortillas su negocio esta ubicado en su lugar de residencia, posee mucha clientela porque siempre mantiene las tortillas bien calientitas y es muy amable con ellos, vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella solicita un crédito para la compra de maíz por mayor y cal, y asi poder seguir con su trabajo para obtener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Alicia is 62 years old and for several years now has made her living selling tortillas, doing business from her house. She has many clients because she always keeps the tortillas nice and warm and is always kind to her customers. 

She lives in her own house with her family group, and is requesting this loan to buy corn in bulk and lime powder, thus continuing with her work and increasing her profits.

loans.use: to buy corn in bulk and lime powder.

loans.name: Fassila

texts.fr: Fassila vit avec son conjoint et leurs 02 enfants scolarisés à Lomé. Elle est commerçante de profession et revend des produits de beauté de façon ambulante. Pour agrandir son activité et subvenir aux besoins de la famille,Fassila demande un premier crédit pour acheter des produits de beauté. Fassila a démarré l'activité il y a 15ans.
texts.en: Fassila lives with her husband and their two children, attending school, in Lomé. She is a merchant by trade and sells her beauty products retail by going door to door. To expand her business and meet the needs of the family, Fassila is asking for an initial loan to purchase beauty products. Fassilas started her business fifteen years ago.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetic products

loans.name: Kossiwa

texts.fr: Jeune femme de 35ans, Kossiwa pour subvenir à ses besoins revend des céréales(Mais, haricot) à domicile et cela depuis 2001. Son approvisionnement se fait à l'intérieur du pays et madame Kossiwa pour renforcer son stock fait un premier prêt à WAGES. Elle souhaite avoir un magasin de stockage et assurer l'éducation de ses progénitures.
texts.en: Kossiwa, a young woman, 35 years old, has been selling grains (corn, beans) out of her home in order to support herself since 2001. Her supplies are gotten inland. To bolster her inventory, Ms. Kossiwa is taking out an initial loan from WAGES. She would like to have a warehouse and ensure her children’s education.

loans.use: to purchase grains (corn, beans)

loans.name: Juan Obdulio

texts.es: Juan de 53 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, el es un hombre muy responsable y trabajador, se dedica a la mecanica de obra de banco( elaboracion de estructuras metalicas: puertas, balcones, portones, techos) desde hace varios años, Juan solicita a INTEGRAL  un credito para comprar mas materiales como hierro, laminas, metal, electrodos, etc.  ya que tiene mucha demanda porque hace un buen trabajo y con las ganancias que obtiene ha logrado sacar adelante a su familia y solventar los gastos que se le presentan en el hogar.
texts.en: Juan is 53 years old and lives in his own home with his wife.  He is a very responsible and hard working man.  He works as a mechanic with a speciality in metallic structures: doors, balconies, entranceways, roofs).  He has been working in this field for several years.  Juan is asking for a loan from Kiva partner INTEGRAL in order to buy materials such as iron, metal sheeting, metal, electrodes, etc.  He has a lot of demand for his work because he does good work.  With the income that he obtains he is able to sustain his family and meet household expenses.

loans.use: to buy materials such as iron, metal sheeting, metal, electrodes, etc.

loans.name: Elenita

texts.en:
Elenita, 36 years old, is married and has four children, three of them currently in school, Elenita works very hard to provide for them.

For the last 2 years, Elenita has run a general store in the Philippines, selling a variety of items such as rice, canned goods, snack foods, soft drinks, cereals, coffee, sugar, etc. She has requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy more of these items to sell. In the future, Elenita would like to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more groceries such as rice, canned goods, snack foods, soft drinks, cereals, coffee, sugar, etc. to sell

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace, 51 years old, is married and living with her husband and their four children. She operates a green grocer business, selling tomatoes, kale, cabbages, onions and other foodstuff. She has applied for a loan to add stock to her business.

Grace hopes that this loan will help increase her income by selling more products which will improve the family's living standards. She is happy for this loan and grateful to Kiva and their lenders for their help and support.

loans.use: to buy additional stock of tomatoes, kale, cabbages and onions

loans.name: Enock

texts.en:
Enock is a mixed-farmer; he keeps animals and cultivates plants for a living. He has been doing this business for over a decade. He is very thankful to have support and encouragement from his lovely wife Susan. Together, they look after four children. 

Enock has been selling milk and crop produce from his farm at Eldoret, which is the nearest urban market. However, the return he makes from this business is not enough to sustain his demands. This circumstance forces Enock to continually seek ways to grow his business, cut costs, and increase his income. So far, he has been able to boost his income by engaging in other businesses. 

Enock is seeking a KES 70,000 loan to expand his plant cultivation business. One of his flagship crops is maize, which is the most important crop in sub-Saharan Africa. It is a staple crop for over 50% of the population. It is consumed by locals in a wide variety of ways (porridges, pastes and beer) as a source of carbohydrate, protein, iron, vitamin B, and other minerals. 

The demand for Enock's produce is always there. In order for him to increase his income, increasing his output is the straightforward way of going about it. He hopes to achieve exactly this by using a loan from Kiva lenders. Money from this investment will help him meet farming-related costs. His family's livelihood will also be greatly impacted by this loan.

loans.use: to expand his plant cultivation business.

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is 42 years old and married with five children. With one child currently in school, Evelyn works very hard to provide for them. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 50,000 loan through NWTF to buy more goods to sell in her general store.

Evelyn has been in this business for 10 years and sells a variety of items such as snack foods, cereals, chocolate drinks, milk, juice, beers, shampoo, etc.  She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more goods to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Leonor

texts.es:
Leonor es una madre de familia dedicada con dos maravillosos hijos, trabaja como empleada en una empresa de su ciudad natal, Lima. Es una persona que desde muy joven ha luchado por sacar adelante a su familia y poder brindarles una educación de calidad a sus hijos. Ella cree que le ha ido bien por su esfuerzo, dedicación y el empeño que le pone a todo lo que hace.
Leonor está agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado podrá comprar un juego de muebles para su casa, con esto su familia tendrá mayor comodidad y así seguirá luchando por el bienestar de su familia, para que más adelante sus hijos puedan convertirse en grandes profesionales.
texts.en:
Leonor is the dedicated mother of a family with two marvelous children. She works as an employee at a business in her hometown of Lima. From the time she way very young, she has been a  person who has fought to support her family and offer a quality education to her children. She believes she has done well due to her efforts, dedication and commitment that she brings to everything she does.  
Leonor is grateful for the Kiva lenders because with their support, she can buy a set of furniture for her home. With this purchase, her family will have greater comfort and she can continue fighting for the well-being of her family. In the future, her children can become great professionals.

loans.use: purchase a set of furniture for her home.

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is a married woman with seven children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Evelyn is 41 years old and has two children who are currently in school.

She has a fruit vending business in the Philippines. Evelyn has requested a PHP 13,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more fruits to sell. She has been in this business for four years. In the future, Evelyn would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more fruits to sell.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.en: Francisca is married and she works hard to support her family. For the past 6 years, she has operated a general store business in the Philippines. Francisca has requested a PHP 22,000 loan through NWTF to buy more groceries to sell in her store. Francisca would like to build and expand her business to secure her family's future.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell in her store

loans.name: Fatima

texts.en: Because Fatima is a conservative lady, she asked her son to appear in the photo in her place. Fatima is a 38-year-old married woman living with her family of six members. He husband is a taxi driver and his income isn’t enough to cover his children's needs. One of Fatima's sons is a third year university student majoring in Electrical Machines Engineering. He wants to finish his studies so that he can find a job in his field after graduating to help his family pay their household fees. Since Fatima's family is currently facing a financial crisis, she has applied for a loan because she doesn’t have enough money to pay for her son's upcoming semester fees.

loans.use: to pay for her son's upcoming semester fees.

loans.name: Jeanette

texts.en: Jeanette is a 33-year-old, married woman with four children who are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Jeanette has a business selling kitchenware in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell to her customers. Jeanette has been in this business for five years. In the future, Jeanette would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Alexander

texts.es:
Alexander tiene 39 años de edad, con mucho esfuerzo logró cursar hasta 6º grado ya que no tenía la condición económica para continuar, está acompañado y su pareja se dedica al comercio de pescado, tiene 3 hijos y solo dos están estudiando 5º y 7º grado.
Alexander se ha dedicado a la pesca artesanal desde que era muy pequeño, ya que su padre y hermanos se dedicaban a esta misma actividad, con mucho esfuerzo y trabajo ha comprado una lancha, también trabaja como albañil y lo aprendió por un amigo.
El crédito lo necesita para comprar redes y otras herramientas necesarias para pescar.

Las aspiraciones a futuro son que sus hijos estudien y puedan superarse,  mejorar su vivienda que se encuentra en mal estado para que su familia se sienta segura.
texts.en:
Alexander is 39 years old. With much effort he manged to study until Grade 6 but did not have the economic conditions to continue. He is in a relationship and his wife works selling fish. He has three children but only two of them are studying in Grade 5 and Grade 7.

Alexander has worked in small scale fishing since he was quite young. His father and brothers worked in this same activity. Through much effort and work he bought a boat. He also works as a bricklayer which a friend taught him. He needs the loan to buy nets and other equipment needed for fishing.

His hopes for the future are that his children study and can better themselves and he wants to improve his house which is in poor condition so that his family feels more secure.

loans.use: to buy nets and other equipment needed for fishing.

loans.name: Nekikokolima Taxi Drivers Group

texts.en:
Ballack, aged 32, is a resident of Ganda Nansana. He is married and has four children who are in school. Ballack has been in business for the last 12 years. He started as a taxi conductor, saved some money and, in 2001, went to a driving school and became a driver in 2002. Ballack believes he is doing well and has hopes of buying his own car. 

Ballack approached UGAFODE for a second loan of 1,000,000 shillings. He will use the loan to renovate his current homestead that is in a sorry state so that he can give his family decent accommodations. Ballack's passengers and workmates describe him as calm, hardworking and focused.

loans.use: To buy paint, cement and lime

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy large quantities of corn

loans.name: Lourdes Celia

texts.es:
La socia Lourdes Celia pertenece al banco comunal BUENA ESPERANZA, él banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia tiene 52 años de edad es casada y tiene 02 hijos, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias trabajando en una empresa privada, la socia lleva buen tiempo trabajando el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia trabaja en el área de cocina, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando  a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de víveres para su casa.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Lourdes Celia belongs to the community bank BUENA ESPERANZA (Good Hope). The bank is based in the Cusco district in the Cusco department. She is 53 years old, married, and has two children. 
The member alternates her daily work activities in a private company. It is going well thanks to the determination that she puts into her work every day. The member works in the kitchen area, and she wants to continue working this way to keep supporting her family. 
She requests this loan to buy supplies for her house. 
She feels grateful for the grant and promises to fulfill her established payments.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her house.

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en:
The person appearing in the photo is Margret, 25 years old, married, and a mother of two children. She joined Hand in Hand Eastern Africa to gain skills on entrepreneurship and financial management.

She buys vegetables from the local farmers and sells them in the city market. Margret is borrowing a loan to purchase more stock for her vegetable business, which she has been operating for the last two years. She has gained more customers in her enterprise, hence borrowing the loan to ensure a consistent supply of her goods. She hopes her income level will increase and that she will be in a position to support her children’s education by buying school uniforms, writing materials, and paying school fees for them. She is happy for Kiva and their lenders for the great support.

loans.use: to buy more stock of vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Lanie

texts.en: Lanie works hard to support her family. Lanie is married and has a sewing business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 21,000 loan through NWTF to buy more materials for her sewing business. Lanie has been in this business for 10 years now. In the future, Lanie would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more materials for her sewing business.

loans.name: Mukuru Wa Karanjee Group

texts.en:
In 2013, Mukuru Wa Karanjee Women Group joined Hand in Hand Eastern Africa in order to be trained on financial and savings management. 

The person raising her hand in the photograph is Pauline. She is 57 years old, married and living with her husband and their four children. She sells second-hand clothing (Mitumba) in a small market in Limuru, Kenya. She has applied for a loan to add more stock of second-hand clothing. 

She hopes that this loan will help increase her income, thus improving their living standards such as quality of clothing. She is happy for this loan and grateful to Kiva for its help and support.

loans.use: to buy more stock of second-hand clothing.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.en: Victoria is married and has been blessed one child. She owns a house that neither has electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is school fees. For the past two years, she has operated a tailoring business, making school uniforms, and suits for both men and women. Her challenge in the business is seasonality. She dreams of establishing a rental houses in the future. With the KES 50,000 she wants to purchase cloth materials, sewing thread, and needles for the business. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase cloth materials, sewing thread, and needles for her business.

loans.name: Amina

texts.en:
Amina is married and blessed with one child who attends school. She owns a house that neither has electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

Amina cooks food to sell at the market, and sells to town dwellers and passersby. She dreams of establishing a café business in the future. With the KES 20,000 she wants purchase to food ingredients such as beans, rice, wheat flour, maize flour, sugar, and cooking fat. She decided to join Yehu to access financial support to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients such as beans, rice, wheat flour, maize flour, sugar, and cooking fat.

loans.name: Mujeres Del Mañana Group

texts.es:
ZENOBIA JUDITH, tiene 51 años de edad, es soltera. Ella forma parte del grupo "Mujeres del Mañana" que está integrado por cinco socias, independientes que quieren salir adelante a base de mucho esfuerzo y con sus propios negocios.
Hace mas de cinco años ella inició un pequeño negocio era una bodeguita con algunas golosinas y bebidas, hoy en día y gracias a los préstamos recibidos de Edaprospo que le han ayudado a inyectarle capital a su bodega su negocio a crecido, es una bodega surtida que puede satisfacer las necesidades y requerimiento de sus clientes.
El préstamo recibido lo invertirá en la compra de productos de abarrotes y bebidas.
texts.en:
ZENOBIA JUDITH, is 51 years old and single. She is a member of the “Women of Tomorrow” group, made up of five independent women who want to make a living through hard work in their own businesses. 

More than five years ago she started a small business, that was just a tiny stall with some sweets and drinks. Today, thanks to the loans received from Edaprospo that helped her inject capital into her stall, the business has grown and is now a well-stocked grocery that can satisfy her client’s needs and expectations. 

She will invest the loan received in buying foodstuffs and drinks.

loans.use: to invest in buying foodstuffs.

loans.name: Satine

texts.en:
Satine successfully repaid her first Kiva loan on schedule which she used for the purchase of furniture for her living room. She is thankful and eager to have her second Kiva loan. 

She lives in Dilijan City with her beloved husband and two sons. Satine is still working at the mineral water factory. Her husband currently has no steady work, so he does different construction work as-needed. Their sons are still school-aged, and, as you remember, they are very talented and clever boys. Her elder son has decided to become a doctor, and her younger son decorates the walls of their house with his nice and colorful paintings painted by him.

Satine requests this loan as she must make a lot of purchases for the new academic year for her sons studying at the school. She will be greatly happy if Kiva lenders help her to overcome this hardship.

loans.use: to purchase items for the new academic year for her sons who study at the school.

loans.name: Alima

texts.ru: Алима, 64 года, вдова, мать 4 детей. Дети Алимы все взрослые и живут отдельно. Алима на протяжении многих лет занимается животноводством и полеводством. Благодаря упорному труду Алимы, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 4 коровы с 2 телятами и 0,57 ГА земельного участка, на котором она выращивает преимущественно кукурузу. Ежемесячная прибыль Алимы составляет до 20,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. Накопленные средства Алима старается вкладывать в развитие бизнеса. В этом году она решила отремонтировать дом, поэтому Алима и обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS) на покупку ламината, кафеля, обои. А прибыль от животноводства Алима планирует вкладывать в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса чтобы накопить средства на образование ее внуков.
texts.en:
Alima is 64 and a widow with four adult children who live on their own. She has been working in animal husbandry and agriculture for many years. Thanks to her hard work she currently has four cows and two calves as well as 0.57 hectares of land on which she grows mainly corn, with a monthly income of about 20,000 KGS per month. She tries to put any money she saves back into developing her business.

This year, she has decided to do some home renovations, and therefore has turned to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 40,000 KGS to purchase laminate flooring, tile and wallpaper. And she plans to continue putting profits from her farming into further developing her business in order to save toward her grandchildren's education.

loans.use: to buy laminate flooring, tile and wallpaper for home renovations

loans.name: Bubuya

texts.ru: Бубуя, 56 лет, замужем, есть сын, образование у Бубуи среднее, она работает в школе. Успешно занимаясь животноводством и полеводством, Бубуя добилась очень хороших результатов, у нее есть 1 корова, 1 теленок, 15 овец и 1 лошадь. Также на земельном наделе мерою 2,25 ГА она выращивает пшеницу, ячмень, картофель для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. Дополнительно Бубуя продает молоко. Ее ежемесячный доход составляет около 7,000 сом (KGS). Для дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Бубуя обратилась в Банк «Бай - Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 2 бычков. На прибыль от кредита Бубуя планирует увеличить своё хозяйство. Она мечтает накопить средства на покупку квартиры для сына.
texts.en:
Bubuya is 56 and married with a son. She has a high school education and works in a school. Having done well with her animal husbandry and agriculture business, she currently has one cow, one calf, 15 sheep and one horse as well as a 2.25 hectare piece of land where she grows wheat, barley and potatoes both for her own use and for sale. She also sells milk, and has a total monthly income of about 7,000 KGS.

In order to further develop her business, Bubuya has turned to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 50,000 KGS to purchase two steers. She plans to put profits from the loan back into her farm. She dreams of saving toward purchasing an apartment for her son.

loans.use: to purchase two steers for fattening and resale

loans.name: Kibibi

texts.en:
Kibibi is married with three school-going children. They live in their own house which has electricity but no piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees. 

She operates a Khanga-selling business (women's wrap cloth), selling from her home and door-to-door to her neighbors and passersby. She faces a major challenge of lack of capital to expand her business.

With the loan she is requesting, she wants to purchase bales of Khangas for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bales of Khangas for resale.

loans.name: Mavluda

texts.ru: Мавлуда молодая незамужняя девушка в возрасте 24 лет. Она живет с родителями в районе Шахритус. Мавлуда в течение 5 лет занимается растениеводством. Она работает в фермерском хозяйстве. Мавлуда трудящаяся девушка и не боится тяжелой сельскохозяйственной работы. Напротив ей нравится работать на земле и видеть как ее труд приносит свои плоды. В данный момент Мавлуда поглощена очередными посевными работами. Однако чтобы приобрести семена и минеральные удобрения она ощущает нехватку финансов. В связи с этим Мавлуда обратилась за кредитом. Она надеется получить от Вас поддержку и финансовую помощь, чтобы провести озимые посевы.
texts.en:
Mavluda is an unmarried young woman of 24 who lives with her parents in the Shahrituz region. She has been working in agriculture for five years. Mavluda is a hardworking woman and not afraid of heavy agricultural work. On the contrary, she likes to work the land and see how her efforts yield fruit. 

At the moment, Mavluda is occupied with the upcoming planting work. However, she doesn't have enough money to purchase seeds and mineral fertilizers. Therefore she is requesting a loan. She hopes to receive support and financial help from you, so that she can plant another crop.

loans.use: to buy seeds and mineral fertilizers for winter crops

loans.name: Irina

texts.ru: Ирина в возрасте 30 лет уже разведена и живет с двумя детьми в южном районе Шахритус. Ее детям по 8 и 3 года. Старший ребенок ходит в школу, а младший в детский сад. Сама Ирина работает. Она занимается маленьким торговым бизнесом. Вот уже 5 лет как Ирина занимается куплей и продажей миндаля. Она оптом закупает миндаль у дехкан и затем с наценкой продает торговцам рынка. Этот бизнес и составляет источник дохода ее семьи. Сйчас для продолжения деятельности Ирина нуждается в кредите. Ей не хватает финансов для закупки партии миндаля. Ирина с такой целью обратилась за кредитом и очень надеется на поддержку.
texts.en:
Irina is 30 and already divorced. She lives with her two children, aged eight and three, in the southern region of Shahrituz. Her oldest child is in school and the youngest in preschool, and Irina has her own small retail business buying and selling almonds, something she's been doing for five years. She purchases the almonds wholesale from a farmer and then sells them with mark-up to customers at the market. This business is the primary source of income for her family.

Now, in order to continue her business, Irina needs a loan, since she doesn't have enough money to buy a shipment of almonds. With this goal in mind she is requesting a loan and very hopeful for your support.

loans.use: to buy almonds for resale

loans.name: Sagipa

texts.ru: Сагипа, 58 лет, замужем,мать 3 детей. У Сагипы среднее образование, она на пенсии, также с 2002 года занимается гостиничным бизнесом, сдавая собственные коттеджи отдыхающим на Ысыккуле. В настоящее время у Сагипы 4 двух местных номера с трех разовым питанием. Ежемесячная прибыль Сагипы составляет 12,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего гостиничного бизнеса, Сагипа обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS) на покупку мебели и оборудования для обустройства коттеджей. Это поможет привлечь больше клиентов и накопить средства на обучение младшего сына в университете.
texts.en:
Sagipa is 58 and married with three children. She has a high school education and is retired, and has been running a hospitality business since 2002, renting her own cottages to vacationers at the Issyk Kul Biosphere Reserve. She currently offers four double rooms with three meals a day, with a monthly profit of 12,000 KGS.

With the goal of further developing her business, Sagipa has turned to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 40,000 KGS to purchase furniture and other items to improve her cottages. This will help her to attract more clients and to save toward her youngest son's university education.

loans.use: to purchase furniture and other items to improve her rental cottages and attract more clients

loans.name: Mario  Filadelfo

texts.es: Don Mario de 58 de edad vive con su compañera de vida, el es un hombre muy trabajador y responsable. Actualmente trabaja vendiendo comida cerca de su lugar de residencia desde hace varios años, tiene mucha clientela fija pues da a un buen precio el plato de comida, Don Mario desea ampliar su puesto es decir comprar mesas, sillas, mas materia prima para variar su menú y tener un poco de mas entrada económicamente, pero no cuenta con los suficientes ingresos para esta inversión,es por eso que solicita un crédito para comprar lo dicho; y asi obtener mejores ganancias.
texts.en: Mario is 58 year old. He lives with his domestic partner. He is a very hardworking and responsible man. Currently, he works selling food near his place of residence. He has worked doing this for many years and has a set of regular customers because he sells the plate of food at a good price. Mario wants to expand his stall by buying tables, chairs, more ingredients to vary his menu and to earn more income. Since he does not have the income for this investment he is requesting a loan to buy what was mentioned before, and in this way obtain more earnings.

loans.use: to buy tables, chairs, vegetables, fruits, chickens, meats, rice, etc.

loans.name: Satik

texts.en:
Satik and her daughter live in Sevan of Gegharkunik region. Satik sells women's, men's, and children's clothes, sportswear, and shoes in the city's wholesale market in a rented stall, which she has been doing for many years. She has her loyal customers, who for many years do their shopping from her stall. Her customers like the style of the cloths and Satik's service. Satik’s daughter also works at the shop.

Satik requested a loan, which she will use to purchase a new collection of clothes for the autumn and winter cold season.

loans.use: to purchase a new collection of clothes

loans.name: Choeun

texts.en:
Choeun is 50 years old, married, and has seven children, two attend school, two are construction workers, and one works in a Chinese noodle shop. Choeun is a farmer. Her husband is also a farmer and a construction worker. They live in Kampong Speu Province, Cambodia. Together, they earn approximately $26 a day. 

Choeun requested a loan, which she will use to buy rice seeds and a water pump for cultivating rice. This loan will help her earn more income for the family. In the future, she is going to fill the soil around her house to avoid flooding and support her children to go to university.

loans.use: to purchase rice seeds and a water pump for cultivating rice

loans.name: Messan

texts.fr: Revendeur d’œufs il y a 7ans, Messan fait un premier crédit pour acheter plus de marchandises. A l'avenir, il souhaite aménager son lieu d'activité et bien nourrir sa famille(Sa femme est infirmière et ils ont 01 enfant de 11 mois).
texts.en: Messan has been reselling eggs for seven years, and is asking for a loan so that he can buy more goods. In the future, he would like to renovate his place of business and better feed his family. His wife is a nurse and they have an 11-month old child.

loans.use: to buy eggs.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es: Carlos tiene una microempresa donde prepara embutidos de manera artesanal; carnes, chinchurrias, verduras condimentos y aliños son su principal materia primas para producirlos. Su negocio inició hace 10 años,  aprendió de su hermano y cuando emprendió su propio generador de ingresos lo mejoró notablemente. Hoy su meta es lograr el crecimiento de esta unidad productiva  en la que prepara butifarras, chorizos, y ha adicionado huevos. Diariamente pasa por las calles vendiendo lo que él mismo produce, lanzando un silbido que sus clientes ya conocen, así como también el  sonido de su cuchillo que rosa a su recipiente que lleva prensado al cuello, como lo registra la fotografía. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundacion Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará: al por mayor carnes, chinchurrias, verduras condimentos y aliños, para molerlos y cocinarlos y luego preparar los deliciosos y naturales embutidos, que hacen deleitar el paladar de todos sus clientes.  Con esta inversión su negocio mejorará en productividad y tendrá para fin de año muchas mas ganancias con que contar para los gastos que requieren las familias en estas fiestas.
texts.en:
Carlos has a small business where he prepares sausages in an artisan way; meats, chinchurrias (fried intestines), seasoned vegetables and condiments are his principal materials to make them. His business started 10 years ago, he learned from his brother and when undertook earning his own income he got notably better. 
Today his goal is to achieve growth in this productive field, namely that he will prepare butifarras (Catalan sausage), pork sausage, and he has added eggs. Daily he walks through the streets selling what he himself produces. He whistles out and his customers know the sound, they also know the sound of his knife against his container that he wears hung around his neck, as shown in the photo. Currently he is applying for a loan, the first financing that  Fundación Mario Santo Domingo has done, with which he will buy: wholesale meet, sausages, seasoned vegetables and condiments, to grind and to cook them and then prepare his delicious and natural sausages that delight the taste buds of all his customers. With this investment his business will improve in productivity and will have by the end of the year, more profits that he can count on for all the required costs for families during the holidays.

loans.use: to buy wholesale meats, sausages, seasoned vegetables and condiments.

loans.name: Sammy

texts.en:
Sammy is married and has two children. He is a mixed farmer, which he has been doing for five years. He is from Kurgung village. Dairy farming in this region is a very lucrative business. Most of the villagers practice dairy farming yet they still live in abject poverty.

Sammy sells his milk, eggs, and crops at a local market in Kapsabet. The prices he receives for his produce are very low because brokers buy them and sell them at fairer markets. That is not the only problem these farmers face; the cost of farm inputs is very high because they are situated in an area that lacks infrastructure. Lack of infrastructure facilities is the principal source of market fragmentation and inefficiency in the transmission of price signals. 

Sammy requested a loan, which he will use to purchase a motorcycle. The motorcycle will facilitate accessibility to farm inputs and credit service far beyond the Kurgung environ. He will be able to visit agricultural service providers who tend to only frequent areas with adequate infrastructure. With this loan, Sammy will be able to eliminate the greedy brokers by transporting his produce straight to markets with better price offerings.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle for farm transportation

loans.name: Edem

texts.fr: Afin d'acheter des outils de travail, Mr Edem âgé de 31ans demande un troisième prêt à WAGES. Il est mécanicien de profession et il se fait aidé par 03 personnes. A l'avenir, Edem espère avoir son propre locale et assurer l'avenir de la famille(Il est marié avec un enfant en charge).
texts.en: Mr. Edem is 31 and is asking for a third loan from WAGES in order to buy work tools. He is a mechanic by profession and has three people who work for him. In the future, he would like to have his own place of business and secure his family's future. (He is married with one dependent child.)

loans.use: to buy work tools.

loans.name: Luis Antonio

texts.es:
Luis de 33 años de edad, con ayuda de sus padres y hermanos mayores pudo estudiar hasta 4º grado, está casado y tienen un hijo de 6 años de edad que está estudiando 3º grado.

Luis se ha dedicado a trabajar desde que estaba muy pequeño en la agricultura y crianza de ganado, en época de invierno se dedica a trabajar dos hectáreas de maíz y una de ajonjolí, tiene que estar muy temprano en el lugar y solo su esposa le ayuda en ocasiones.

Los fondos del crédito serán utilizados para comprar insumos agrícolas, fertilizantes, abonos y para la preparación de la tierra para el cultivo de una hectárea de ajonjolí.

Los planes a futuro son mejorar su vivienda y apoyar a su hijos en los estudios.
texts.en:
Luis is 33 years old, with the help of his parents and older siblings was able to study up to the 4th grade, married and with a son of 6 years old who is at school in 3rd grade.

Luis has dedicated himself to his work since he was very young in farming and raising cattle, in the winter season he works on two hectares of corn and one of sesame, he has to be at the place very early and only his wife helps him occasionally. 

The loan money will be used to buy farming supplies, fertilizer, manure and to clear the land to grow a hectare of sesame.

His plans for the future are to improve his house and support his child in at school.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies, fertilizers, manure and to clear the land for a hectare of sesame.

loans.name: José Balmori

texts.es:
José es un joven de 23 años de edad, con mucho esfuerzo sus padres le ayudaron a que estudiara hasta quinto grado, está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tiene un hijo de 3 años de edad.

José se dedica a trabajar en la pesca artesanal desde que era muy pequeño, ya que su padre y hermanos se dedicaban a esta misma actividad, él  va a pescar dependiendo la temporada, a veces va por las noches o sino por la madrugada, además trabaja como albañil y lo aprendió por un amigo.

Él necesita el crédito para comprar trasmallos, redes y otras herramientas necesarias para la pesca.

Los planes a futuro son mejorar su vivienda y quiere comprar su propia lancha pues la que utiliza es rentada.
texts.en:
José is a young man, 23 years old. It took a lot of effort for his parents to help him so he could study up to fifth grade. He lives with his girlfriend, who is a homemaker. She has a 3-year-old son. 

José has worked as a traditional fisherman since he was very young, because his father and brothers dedicated their time to this same business. Depending on the season, he goes out fishing, sometimes at night, or if not, at dawn. He also works in construction, which he learned from a friend. 

He needs the loan to buy trammel nets, nets and other tools that are needed for fishing.

His plans for the future are to improve his housing and he wants to buy his own boat since the one he uses is rented.

loans.use: To buy trammel nets, nets and other tools that are needed for fishing.

loans.name: Carmen Rosa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal BUENOS AMIGOS, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Carmen Rosa tiene 37 años de edad es viuda y tiene 02 hijos, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de artesania, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día  a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de chomas, polos entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con todas sus cuotas.
texts.en:
Carmen Rosa belongs to the community bank Buenos Amigos [Good Friends], which is located in the district of Cusco in the department of Cusco. She is 37 years old, a widow, and has 2 children. She alternates her daily activities with her business, selling handicrafts. She has been working at her business for quite some time and it is going well for her, thanks to the effort she puts in each day. Carmen Rosa wants to be able to keep working so that in this way she can continue supporting her family.

She is requesting a loan to buy sweaters, polos, and other items. She feels very grateful for the awarded loan, and promises to make all of the payments.

loans.use: to buy sweaters, polos, and other items.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy hair products for her salon

loans.name: Aissatou's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe est créé depuis juillet 2011.Il regroupe des membres qui sont issus de la même zone,elles ont comme activité l'agriculture et le commerce.

Aissatou qui se trouve à droite de la photo et levant le bras,est la responsable du groupe,elle est est mariée et mére de 09 enfants dont 03 filles.

Son activité est le commerce de mil et d'arachide.

Avec le prêt reçu,elle compte acheter 50 kg de mil à 150f le kg et elle revend pour 200f le kg et 50 kg d'arachide pour 12500f et revend pour 350f le kg.

Avec le bénéfice issu de ces ventes,elle compte contribuer aux dépenses de la famille pour les charges liées à la nourriture.
texts.en:
This group was created in July 2011 and brings together members from the same area. They work in agriculture and business.

Aissatou, pictured at right with her hand raised, is in charge of the group. She is married and has nine children, three of whom are girls. 

She sells millet and peanuts. With this loan, she would like to buy 50 kg of millet for 150 FCFA per kg that she will resell for 200 FCFA per kg. She will also buy 50 kg of peanuts for 12,500 FCFA that she will resell for 350 FCFA per kg.

With her profits, she will contribute to the household expenses and help pay for food.

loans.use: to buy millet and peanuts.

loans.name: Tarynda Shamelly

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal BUENOS AMIGOS, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Tarynda  tiene 36 años de edad y es soltera, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias trabajando como contadora, la socia lleva buen tiempo en su trabajo  el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día  a su trabajo, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de materiales de escritorio como hojas entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con todas sus cuotas.
texts.en:
She belongs to the communal bank Buenos Amigos, the bank is located in the Cusco district and Cusco department. Tarynda is 36 years old and single, she divides her daily activities with working as an accountant, she has been in her job for a long time and she is doing well due to the effort that she puts into her work every day. She wants to continue working so that in this way she can continue supporting her family.

She is requesting a loan to buy stationery materials such as paper, etc. She is grateful for the authorized loan and commits to making all of the payments.

loans.use: to buy stationery materials such as paper, etc.

loans.name: Ever

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal BUENOS AMIGOS, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio  tiene 29 años de edad es soltero y tiene 03 hijos , el socio alterna sus actividades diarias trabajando como maestro de obra, el socio lleva buen tiempo en su trabajo  el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día  a su trabajo, el socio desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
El socio solicita el crédito para la compra de herramientas como combo entre otros.
El socio se siente agradecido por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con todas sus cuotas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the community bank, BUENOS AMIGOS. The bank is located in the district of Cusco and state of Cusco.

The member is 29 years old, single, with 3 children. The member varies his daily activities, working as a master builder. The member has worked at this job for a good amount of time. His job is going well, thanks to the effort he puts in every day. The member would like to continue working so he can continue to support his family. 

The member is requesting a loan to buy tools, including such things as a sledge hammer. 

The member feels grateful to be granted a loan and promises to comply with all his payments.

loans.use: To buy tools, including such things as a sledge hammer.

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal BUENOS AMIGOS, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Rosa Maria  tiene 42 años de edad  es soltera y tiene 03 hijos, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con su negocio de venta de ropa, la socia lleva buen tiempo en su negocio  el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día  a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de chompas y casacas.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con todas sus cuotas.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the Buenos Amigos communal bank, this bank is located in the Cusco district, Cusco department. Rosa Maria is 42 years old, single with 3 children. She divides her daily activities with her business selling clothing. She has been in this business a long time, it's going well due to the effort she puts into it every day, she wants to continue working so that in this way she can continue supporting her family.

She is requesting a loan to buy sweaters and jackets. She feels grateful for the authorized loan and commits to making all the payments.

loans.use: to buy sweaters and jackets.

loans.name: Leonidez

texts.en:
Leonidez, 53, is a married woman with thirteen children, four of whom are still in school. For the past five years she has worked hard at her business selling ready to wear clothes.

Leonidez has requested a 11,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more blouses, pants, shorts, etc. to sell. Her goal is to save enough money so she can afford to send her younger children to college.

loans.use: to buy more blouses, pants, shorts, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Letecia

texts.en:
Letecia is married and works hard to support her family. For the past nine years she has sold fruit in the Philippines.

Letecia has applied for a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more fruit to sell to her customers. Her objective is to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more fruit to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Luz

texts.en:
Luz is 43 years old and married with five children.

Luz works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store.

Luz has borrowed and repaid 21 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 13 years and also earns an income from a manicure/pedicure business.

Luz aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Ma. Elma

texts.en:
Ma. Elma works hard to support her family. She is married and has a general-store business in the Philippines.

Ma. Elma requested a 50,000-PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store.

She has been in this business for 10 years now.

In the future, Ma. Elma would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en: Mohammad is an independent 22 year old young man who lives with five family members. His aim is to find a job with a good income. Mohammad is now a third-year university student majoring in Computer Information Systems. He is requesting a loan to pay his upcoming tuition fees. Obtaining a university education will enable him to reach his goal and give him the chance to support his family.

loans.use: to pay his upcoming tuition fees

loans.name: Juana Paula

texts.es:
La socia continua  dedicándose  al negocio de ferreteria,la socia lleva años dedicándose  a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias  al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para comprar pintura entre otros.
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Juana Paula continues running her hardware store. She has had this business for years and the business is going well thanks to the hard work she puts into it each day. She hopes to be able to continue working and to continue supporting her family.
She requests a new loan to purchase paint, among other things. Juana Paula is glad to have received the loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase paint.

loans.name: Liana

texts.en:
Liana is 65 years old, living in the Zugdidi district of West Georgia with her son. She’s a very kind, hardworking, enthusiastic woman who focuses all her efforts into getting ahead. 

Sadly, for lack of economic resources and because she had to start working at a very young age, Liana was unable to study a professional career. She and her son are unemployed, but they are involved in agricultural activities. In particular, they have a plot of agricultural land where they grow 210 nut trees and maize. Liana sells the harvested products locally. 

She decided to start a husbandry business and requested a loan. The start-up program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva and Credo, enables her to get a loan of 1,000 GEL to purchase a cow. As the cow is purchased, Liana will start producing dairy products to sell locally. She will be able to increase her income and expand the business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase a cow

loans.name: Maria Victoria

texts.en:
Maria Victoria is a married woman with six children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Maria Victoria is 46 years old, and four of her children are currently in school.

Maria Victoria has a fruit-vending business in the Philippines. She requested a 14,000-PHP loan through NWTF to buy a greater variety of fruits to sell.

Maria Victoria has been in this business for six years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy a greater variety of fruits to sell

loans.name: Ethel

texts.en:
Ethel is a married woman but has no kids. They live in a rental house that has neither electricity or piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family.

Ethel operates a clothing sale business.  She sells at the market to the town dwellers and her neighbours. She cites her major challenge to be the rate of stock turnover which is affected by seasons. 

With the loan, she is requesting to purchase one bale of clothes for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business

loans.use: to purchase one bale of clothes for resale

loans.name: Luzviminda

texts.en:
Luzviminda is a hardworking entrepreneur. For the past six years, she has run a general store business in the Philippines. Luzviminda also earns money from selling fish.

Luzviminda is requesting PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy more items to sell in her general store. She has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts and the help of NWTF loans. She dreams of building and expanding her business so she can secure her family's future.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell in her general store

loans.name: Francisco Antonio

texts.es:
Francisco de 24 años de edad, estudió hasta 2º año bachillerato, está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos y tiene un hijo de pocos meses de edad.

Francisco trabaja en la agricultura desde que era muy pequeño, ya que su padre y hermanos se dedicaron a esta misma actividad, actualmente cultiva 2 hectáreas de maíz y una de ajonjolí, además se dedica al cuido de ganado.

Él necesita el crédito para comprar insumos agrícolas como abonos y fertilizantes para el cultivo de una hectárea de maíz.

Su sueño es tener su propia vivienda ya que actualmente está cuidando casa donde vive.
texts.en:
Francisco is 24 years old. He studied up through the second year of high school and is now married; his wife is a homemaker and they have a son who is a few months old.

Francisco has worked in agriculture since he was little because his father and brothers are also farmers. He now cultivates 2 hectares of corn and one of sesame. He also raises cattle.

He needs this loan to purchase agricultural supplies such as compost and fertilizers to use on one of his hectares of corn.

Francisco's dream is to own his own home, since he is currently a caretaker for the house in which he lives.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies such as compost and fertilizers to cultivate a hectare of corn.

loans.name: José Roberto

texts.es:
José de 39 años de edad, padre de tres hijos, estudio hasta noveno grado. Se encuentra acompañado, su pareja,  estudio hasta octavo grado, dos hijos estudian y el último esta muy pequeño.

José se dedica a vender pan desde que tenia 15 años y tambien realiza labores agricolas. El crédito sera utilizado en la compra de pesticidas y abono para la milpa, con ello buscara mejorar sus ingresos para mejorar su calidad de vida. 

El sueño de José es comprar un terreno, construir su casa propia y asegurar el futuro de sus hijos
texts.en:
José, 39, is the father of three children. He studied until the 9th grade. He is in a relationship. His partner studied until the 8th grade. Two of their children are in school and the third is very young.

José has sold bread since he was 15 and he also does agricultural work. The loan will be used to purchase pesticides and fertilizer for the fields which will improve his income as he seeks to improve their quality of life. 

José's dream is to buy land, build his own home, and secure the future of his children.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and pesticides for his crops

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es:
El socio Julio Cesar, él socio sigue dedicándose al negocio de crianza de animales menores como cuyes y trabajando como seguridad, él socio desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
El socio solicita el crédito para la compra de cuyes.
 El socio se siente agradecido por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This is Julio Cesar, who continues his business of raising small animals such as guinea pigs. He also works as a security guard. 
He hopes to continue working to be able to continue supporting his family. 
He requests a loan to purchase guinea pigs.
Julio Cesar is grateful for the loan and promises to make his payments.

loans.use: to purchase guinea pigs.

loans.name: Zawadi

texts.en:
Zawadi is married and has four children, all of whom attend school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family.

For the past five years, she has operated a retail shop from her home. Her customers are neighbors and passersby. She cites seasonality and delayed payments as a business challenge.

Zawadi decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business. She will use the Kshs 25,000 loan to purchase maize flour, beans, and sugar.

loans.use: to purchase maize flour, beans, and sugar

loans.name: Marleny Del Carmen

texts.es:
Marleny de 43 años de edad, madre de tres hijos, estudio hasta tercer grado, esta compañada, su pareja se dedica a la agricultura.

Ella y su esposo se han dedicado por mas de 20 años a la agricultura, su pareja tambien se dedica a la venta de pan.

El préstamo sera utilizado en la compra de una motocicleta para salir a vender pan a partes donde no puede movilizarse su esposo.

El sueño de Marleny es mejorar su calidad de vida,  aumentar sus ingresos, llegar a tener un terreno propio para poder trabajar la agricultura.
texts.en:
Marleny is 43 years old. She studied up through the third grade. She is the mother of three daughters and is married. Her husband is a farmer.

Marleny and her husband have dedicated themselves to farming for over 20 years. Her husband also sells bread.

The loan will be used to purchase a motorcycle which will be used to go out to sell bread in areas where her husband isn't able to get to by foot.

Marleny's dream is to improve her quality of life, to improve her income and to someday purchase her own land which she will use for farming.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle which she will use to sell bread.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in cement, sand, gravel, bricks and iron to build a sanitary station with septic tank and washable water storage tank.

loans.name: Martha 	Miriam

texts.es:
Martha es una mujer de 60 años de edad, casada, tiene dos hijos independientes de 22 y 27 años, y su negocio es la artesanía en perlas y macramé.
Ella es independiente, luchadora, constante y trabajadora. Su trabajo lo realiza en la zona de ‘alto Miraflores’ un lugar residencial donde existe muy poco comercio.
Martha es de tez morena, cabello negro largo, su lengua materna es el español y conoce el aymara por herencia. Su trabajo es la artesanía en perlas, macramé e hilo de cola de rata realizando diferentes manualidades. Este es el segundo crédito que solicita, comenta que la anterior vez le fue bien, ahora necesita realizar la reparación del salón de juegos infantil  de su hija y realizar la compra de nuevos juguetes. Ella ya tiene una edad avanzada por lo que le cuesta bastante desplazarse de un lugar a otro y entregar sus trabajos, pronto sólo trabajará en su casa y su hija le ayudará a repartir sus productos. Su sueño es que sus hijos terminen de estudiar para sentirse satisfecha de haber logrado ese objetivo.
Es por esos motivos que Martha solicita un préstamo para la reparación del salón de juegos infantil y con los beneficios ayudar a la finalización del estudio de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Martha is a woman of 60 years old, married, she has two independent children of 22 and 27 years old, her business is handicrafts of beads and macrame. She is independent, feisty, steady and hardworking. Her work takes place in the 'alto Miraflores' area, a residential zone where there is very little business.

Martha has a dark complexion, long black hair, her mother tongue is Spanish and she knows Aymara through family legacy. Her work is handicrafts in beads and macrame and rattail yarn, making different crafts. This is the second loan she has requested, she says that the previous one went well, now she needs to make repairs to the children's playroom of her daughter and purchase new toys. She is already of an advanced age so it would cost a lot for her to move to another place and deliver her products, soon she will just work in her house and her daughter will help her to deliver her products. Her dream is that her children will finish their studies to be able to feel satisfied at having achieved this objective.

It is for these aims that Martha is requesting a loan to repair the children's playroom and with the benefits help to finance her children's studies.

loans.use: to repair the children's playroom and with the benefits help her children complete their studies.

loans.name: Gregorio

texts.es:
El socio sigue dedicándose al negocio de restaurant y a la venta de cerveza, el socio es una persona responsable y empeñoso, él socio continua trabajando conjuntamente con su esposa siendo de esta manera que el socio saca adelante a su familia.
El socio solicita el crédito para la compra de aceite, arroz entre otros.
El socio se siente agradecido por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This communal bank member continues working in the restaurant business and selling beer. He is a responsible and persevering person. He continues to work together with his wife, since in this way he is raising his family.

He is applying for the loan to buy oil and rice, among other items.

He is grateful for the loan and promises to make his payments.

loans.use: to buy oil and rice, among other items.

loans.name: María Del Tránsito

texts.es:
María de 60 años de edad, estudió hasta 8º grado de educación básica, está casada y su esposo es agricultor, tiene tres hijos de los cuales uno de ellos ya no vive junto a ella porque está casado, los otros dos están estudiando en la universidad.

María se dedica a la venta de pescado, anteriormente ella salía a venderlo pero ahora tiene un lugar fijo y las personas llegan a comprar ahí, además junto a su esposo cultivan 2 hectáreas de maíz.

Ella necesita este crédito para comprar insumos agrícolas como abonos, semillas y fertilizantes para aplicarlo al cultivo de maíz.

Su sueño es seguir trabajando junto a su esposo y que sus hijos logren ser profesionales.
texts.en:
